AUTHOR: Lunar Dust forked by DeungDeung
INSTALL_MSG: Thank you for downloading one of my cogs!
NAME: greet
SHORT: Plays a sound effect when a user joins a voice channel.
DESCRIPTION:
Plays a sound effect when a user joins a voice channel. Different sound effects can be chosen for different users. Currently the bot owner must manually add audio files to data/greet/sounds for it to work.
Thanks to Will(tekulvw) for the audio file playing :)
